sentences.en: Families of six or seven are the norm in Borough Park.
sentences.cn: 六七口人的家庭在菠萝园是常事儿。

sentences.en: Jadyn Olivia Gonce lives in the Bronx borough of New York.
sentences.cn: 婕婷·奥利维亚·戈斯居住在纽约布朗克斯区。

sentences.en: Knowsley Metropolitan Borough supplied all its schools returns.
sentences.cn: 诺斯利大都会区提供了所有的学校报酬。
